Class MouseInput

java.lang.Object
MouseInput
All Implemented Interfaces:
java.awt.event.MouseListener, java.awt.event.MouseMotionListener, java.util.EventListener, javax.swing.event.MouseInputListener
public class MouseInput
extends java.lang.Object
implements javax.swing.event.MouseInputListener
A mouse listener class.

This should be public and static in the game class, and registered as a mouse listener and mouse motion listener in the Game constructor
Contains a public static Point storing the position of the mouse on the screen
this.addMouseListener(mouseInput);
 this.addMouseMotionListener(mouseInput);

  • Field Details

    • clickListeners

      private static java.util.LinkedList<MouseClickListener> clickListeners
      A list of objects implementing mouseClickListener. All mouse click events are broadcast to this list

    • mousePos

      public static java.awt.Point mousePos
      The location of the mouse on the screen. X and Y coordinates can be accessed directly (i.e. 
      MouseInput.mousePos.x
      )

  • Constructor Details

    • MouseInput

      public MouseInput()
      MouseInput constructor.
      Initialises the mousePos to avoid null errors.
